Text: EREC Preliminary Plan Cc Steve Please find attached the preliminary EREC earnings and cash flow plans This is a preliminary draft only As discussed with Tod the operating cost line has been adjusted at a summary level to achieve the IBIT target agreed to during Fridays review with Stan Horton The actual adjustments made to arrive at the final plan will involve different timing and PL lines Please contact me at if you have any concerns Thank you Chris Lambert
EREC Plan PresentationTracy Please find attached the Plan presentation for Adams review with Stan scheduled for Thurdsday Please let me know if you have any concerns Thank you Chris

EREC Plan Presentation Cc Tracy Please find attached the EREC Business Plan and Operating Budget presentation prepared for the review with Ken Lay originally scheduled for Nov th Please contact me if you have any concerns Thank you Chris

Re FW Information Request Cc Tracy Attached is the file you requested I have made substantial assumptions regarding the requested content and the content provided may not be what was intended to be requested Please note the following The EREC earnings figures are from the Hyperion system as of Oct th The Expenses are from the CE and Plan respectively The costtype breakdown requested is not available The cash burn rate is net and ties to the change in the Enron Working Capital line balance by period I do not have visibility to the gross outflows due to format differences Please call with any questions Thanks Chris From Tracy nronXgate on PM CST To Chris nron cc Subject FW Information Request Please call me as soon as you get this Tod is out of the office Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Friday November AM To Saunders James Chandler Bob Sommers Jeffrey E Anderson Michael Stevens Kirk Giles Valerie Lindholm Tod A Walker Blake Cc Zahn Gary Walters Jr Harry Subject FW Information Request Importance High Please see the three tabs for EGS and complete for your business unit I will need this back to me by today so I can consolidate and give to Corp by The numbers should be the ones consolidated to Enron only Jim and Bob can you complete the EGS IS tab for me for ETS and EOTT Thanks Tracy Original Message From Schwarzbach Stephen Sent Friday November AM To Hodges Georganne Myers Thomas Geaccone Tracy Castleman Kent Ueckert Allen W Smith Kirk Roper Kerry Vargas Hope Stubblefield Wade Cc Lindsey Mark E Subject Information Request Hello everyone I know that many if not all of you have worked on numerous requestsinitiatives from the office of the chair and other teams lately That being said we received a new request on Thursday night which is another look at some of the information your groups may have already provided along with some other information Attached is a file with the breakouts and formats as requested by management containing four for some of you five spreadsheets Please complete all of these sheets applicable to your business unit note dollars in millions The requested timing of the completion of this exercise is by pm Friday November Please send the completed file back to me as soon as you are finished If you have any questions about the format or the contents of the file please contact Michelle Nezi Marvin at For any other questions please call Mark Lindsey at Thanks Steve
Revised Schedules Cc Tracy I have reversed the signs on the CF schedule as you requested Chris
